resources.string: Alex is extremely conservative. His future was set from the moment he was born. “Silver spoon syndrome” squared. Having been born into a privileged life, he never had to prove himself. Alex has never had to work a day in his life, and the idea of work is absolutely repugnant to him!
Marty is the guy that everybody loves to be around. He has always made friends easily because he has a way of making others feel good about themselves.
Wacky, outlandish, and mostly annoying, King Julien ensures that the entertainment never stops!
